articles.author: Lisa Kailai Han, Brian Evans
articles.title: S&P 500 closes higher on soft inflation report, Nasdaq jumps 1% as traders snap up tech shares - CNBC
articles.description: On Wednesday, a benign inflation report helped ease concerns about the economy.
articles.content:
The Nasdaq Composite rose on Wednesday after a soft inflation report eased concerns about the economy and as investors snapped up beaten-up technology shares.
The tech-heavy benchmark added 1.22% an… [+2446 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Google’s Gemma 3 is an open source, single-GPU AI with a 128K context window - Ars Technica
articles.description: Gemma 3 is optimized to run on almost anything, from powerful GPUs to a smartphone.
